name: nw_browse_descriptor_t
desc: A service description used to discover Bonjour services.

items.name: func nw_browse_descriptor_create_bonjour_service(UnsafePointer<CChar>, UnsafePointer<CChar>?) -> nw_browse_descriptor_t
items.desc: Initializes a service descriptor used to discover a Bonjour service.

items.name: func nw_browse_descriptor_set_include_txt_record(nw_browse_descriptor_t, Bool)
items.desc: Requires including associated TXT records with all results generated for this service descriptor.

items.name: func nw_browse_descriptor_get_bonjour_service_type(nw_browse_descriptor_t) -> UnsafePointer<CChar>
items.desc: Accesses the Bonjour service type set on a browse descriptor.

items.name: func nw_browse_descriptor_get_bonjour_service_domain(nw_browse_descriptor_t) -> UnsafePointer<CChar>?
items.desc: Accesses the Bonjour service domain set on a browse descriptor.

items.name: func nw_browse_descriptor_get_include_txt_record(nw_browse_descriptor_t) -> Bool
items.desc: Checks if the browse descriptor requires including associated TXT records with all results.
